import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import*as XLSX from'xlsx';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const hardware_projects=["射箭比赛","布袋球","百米短跑","划艇比赛","滑板比赛","掰手腕","投篮大师","谁是大力士","新乒乓球大战","跳绳抛射","耐力跳跃","乒乓球大战","打水漂","飞盘射击","toio 保龄球","太鼓小火车","魔法烟花秀","魔杖泡泡龙","合成大西瓜","投篮挑战"];// 固定门店顺序
const storeOrder=["汇景校区","小北校区","东峻校区","滨江校区","国贸校区","吾悦校区","番禺校区","广钢校区","前海校区","白云校区","东山口校区","活动组"];function App(){const inputRef=useRef();const[tableData,setTableData]=useState([]);const[summary,setSummary]=useState({});const handleFile=async e=>{const file=e.target.files[0];if(!file)return;const data=await file.arrayBuffer();const workbook=XLSX.read(data);const sheet=workbook.Sheets[workbook.SheetNames[0]];const json=XLSX.utils.sheet_to_json(sheet);// 分类
json.forEach(row=>{row['项目类型']=hardware_projects.includes(row['小类'])?'硬件项目':'纯软项目';});// 获取所有门店，并按指定顺序排序
const storesRaw=Array.from(new Set(json.map(row=>row['门店'])));const stores=storeOrder.filter(s=>storesRaw.includes(s));// 每个门店，分别统计纯软/硬件项目前3
const table=stores.map(store=>{const storeRows=json.filter(row=>row['门店']===store);// 纯软
const soft=storeRows.filter(r=>r['项目类型']==='纯软项目');const softTop3=Object.entries(soft.reduce((acc,cur)=>{acc[cur['小类']]=(acc[cur['小类']]||0)+cur['时长（小时）'];return acc;},{})).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,3).map(_ref=>{let[项目,时长]=_ref;return{项目,时长:时长.toFixed(2)};});// 硬件
const hard=storeRows.filter(r=>r['项目类型']==='硬件项目');const hardTop3=Object.entries(hard.reduce((acc,cur)=>{acc[cur['小类']]=(acc[cur['小类']]||0)+cur['时长（小时）'];return acc;},{})).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,3).map(_ref2=>{let[项目,时长]=_ref2;return{项目,时长:时长.toFixed(2)};});return{门店:store,纯软项目:softTop3,硬件项目:hardTop3};});setTableData(table);// 汇总
const summaryObj={};['纯软项目','硬件项目'].forEach(type=>{const typeRows=json.filter(r=>r['项目类型']===type);const top3=Object.entries(typeRows.reduce((acc,cur)=>{acc[cur['小类']]=(acc[cur['小类']]||0)+cur['时长（小时）'];return acc;},{})).sort((a,b)=>b[1]-a[1]).slice(0,3).map(_ref3=>{let[项目,时长]=_ref3;return{项目,时长:时长.toFixed(2)};});summaryObj[type]=top3;});setSummary(summaryObj);};// 导出功能（可选）
const handleExport=()=>{// 组装导出数据
const exportData=tableData.map(row=>{const obj={门店:row.门店};row['纯软项目'].forEach((item,idx)=>{obj["\u7EAF\u8F6FNo.".concat(idx+1)]=item.项目;obj["\u7EAF\u8F6F\u65F6\u957F".concat(idx+1)]=item.时长;});row['硬件项目'].forEach((item,idx)=>{obj["\u786C\u4EF6No.".concat(idx+1)]=item.项目;obj["\u786C\u4EF6\u65F6\u957F".concat(idx+1)]=item.时长;});return obj;});// 汇总
const summaryRow={门店:'汇总'};(summary['纯软项目']||[]).forEach((item,idx)=>{summaryRow["\u7EAF\u8F6FNo.".concat(idx+1)]=item.项目;summaryRow["\u7EAF\u8F6F\u65F6\u957F".concat(idx+1)]=item.时长;});(summary['硬件项目']||[]).forEach((item,idx)=>{summaryRow["\u786C\u4EF6No.".concat(idx+1)]=item.项目;summaryRow["\u786C\u4EF6\u65F6\u957F".concat(idx+1)]=item.时长;});exportData.push(summaryRow);const wb=XLSX.utils.book_new();XLSX.utils.book_append_sheet(wb,XLSX.utils.json_to_sheet(exportData),'整理结果');XLSX.writeFile(wb,'整理结果.xlsx');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",style:{padding:40},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Excel\u9879\u76EE\u5206\u7C7B\u6574\u7406\u5DE5\u5177"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:".xlsx,.xls",ref:inputRef,onChange:handleFile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u4E0A\u4F20Excel\u6587\u4EF6\uFF0C\u81EA\u52A8\u6574\u7406\u5E76\u5728\u9875\u9762\u663E\u793A\u7ED3\u679C\uFF0C\u5982\u9700\u5BFC\u51FA\u8BF7\u70B9\u51FB\u4E0B\u65B9\u6309\u94AE\u3002"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u8868\u5934\u9700\u5305\u542B\uFF1A\u95E8\u5E97\u3001\u5C0F\u7C7B\u3001\u65F6\u957F\uFF08\u5C0F\u65F6\uFF09"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"\u652F\u6301.xlsx/.xls\u683C\u5F0F"})]}),tableData.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{overflowX:'auto',marginTop:32},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{border:"1",cellPadding:"6",style:{borderCollapse:'collapse',minWidth:1100,textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("thead",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{rowSpan:"2",style:{background:'#f6f6f6'},children:"\u95E8\u5E97/\u5206\u7EC4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{colSpan:"6",style:{background:'#e3f0fc'},children:"\u7EAF\u8F6F\u9879\u76EE"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{colSpan:"6",style:{background:'#f5e3fc'},children:"\u786C\u4EF6\u9879\u76EE"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{background:'#e3f0fc'},children:"No.1
